With - * [XHTML 1.0] - * documents, this method only searches for Nodes with a matching - * id attribute. This method is case insensitive in HTML documents - * and case sensitive in XHTML documents. - * - * @param name The name of the Node to be fetched. - * @return The Node with a name or id - * attribute whose value corresponds to the specified string. Upon - * failure (e.g., no node with this name exists), returns - * null. - */ - Node namedItem(String name); + /** + * This method retrieves a Node using a name. Upon + * failure (e.g., no node with this name exists), returns + * null. + */ + Node namedItem(String name); }
